name: Terra Incognita - A retro inspired RPG
blurb: Terra Incognita is a retro inspired, turn based, Role playing game for Windows. If stretch goals are met Mac/Linux/Android/Ouya & WiiU

rewards.reward: Pledges of \u00a31 will get you: You will get the game - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.\r\nAnd our sincere thanks!
Pledges of \u00a35 will get you:\r\nYour name in the game credits!\r\nYou will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

Pledges of \u00a315 will get you:\r\nYour name in the game credits and a limited edition pixel art sticker from the game.\r\nYou will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

Digital Pack!  ~ \u00a320\r\nPledges of \u00a320 will get you: Your name in the game credits and a limited edition pixel art sticker from the game. You will also get the a digital copy of the game soundtrack, digital art book and wallpaper. You will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

Pledges of \u00a330 will get you: Your name in the game credits, a limited edition pixel art sticker from the game and an in game character with a name and design of your choice(no full names, just first name or nicknames) Example: Jack Dagger, Dwarven design, Ginger beard, Gold Armour.\r\nYou will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

Pledges of \u00a340 will get you: Your name in the game credits, a limited edition pixel art sticker from the game and an in game town OR dungeon, you can help name it, design it and its layout if you like. You can also help choose a reward for the player at the end of the dungeon. You will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

Sequel Pack!  ~ \u00a350\r\nPledges of \u00a350 will get you: Everything from lower pledge amounts and you will also receive Terra chapter 2 and any future Terra games for free!  You will obviously get the game as well - Terra Incognita Full PC game one week early from release date.

If you are awesome and pledge \u00a370 or more you will get everything from the lower pledge amounts. But you will also get a Special edition boxed physical copy of the game on disk with art cards included. And you be declaring yourself as a True fan of retro/classic RPGs!

If you are as excited by Terra Incognita as we are then this pledge will get you everything form previous pledge amounts + A limited edition Terra Mouse matt, A Terra magnet/fridge magnet, A Terra Mug OR Iphone Case and finally you will get an Official Terra Incognita Loyalty Card. This will get you Chapter 2 and ANY further Terra games for free. (A second chapter is already a confirmed definite)

Playable Character pack!\r\nONLY 2 AVAILABLE! \r\nYou can create your character and battle sprites or you can have a chat to me and I'll take your ideas to create an awesome set. You can also create class/special ability ideas for me to put in game. You can have as much or as little input into the making of your character as you like. These characters WILL include a full sidequest story arc to unlock. You will also get special art-card with your character on and a Vinyl sticker featuring your hero. You will get everything from lower pledge amounts too.
